thread.title: Duarte, Inc. announced today that it has appointed industry leader, Joe Terry as Chief Executive Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Duarte, Inc. announced today that it has appointed industry leader, Joe Terry as Chief Executive Officer
text:
SANTA CLARA, Calif., March 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- As Duarte, Inc. enters its 30th anniversary year, there is significant opportunity in the market to help individuals and organizations improve how they present. With Joe Terry leading the team, Duarte, Inc. will increase the cadence of products and services to the market and extend its market reach.
"Technology continues to disrupt the way people influence each other. Even the way presentations are created and delivered is shifting, so Joe is the perfect guy to come in and leverage all the opportunities that are opening up in the presentation space," said Duarte Inc's Founder, Nancy Duarte. Nancy will continue at Duarte, Inc. as Principal, focusing on the continued development of intellectual property, and releasing an innovative range of products and services.
Joe comes to Duarte, Inc. from Corporate Visions, where he led the company to record growth in bookings, revenue, and profits, in the first seven years under his leadership. Through an almost ten-year transformation, Joe built a culture which achieved both Employee (62) and Customer (76) world-class, Net Promoter Scores.
"I've long been a fan and admirer of Nancy, and the intellectual property her company brings to the marketplace," Terry said. "This team really understands the power stories have to inspire people to do more than they ever thought was possible. And because stories happen everywhere, not just at keynotes and in meetings, there is unlimited opportunity to create impact.
"Whether you're a CEO, executive, or the head of a department, you can use the power of story to communicate with and inspire your team. That's what Duarte, Inc. does: we help people take their vision and strategy and teach them to create stories that change the world. That's huge and there's an unlimited, untapped opportunity because of what story means to people," Terry explained.
Duarte says, "I've known and admired Joe for years. He's visionary and empathetic and leads in a way that makes you want to bring your best. Running a business in the Valley has unique strategic challenges, and Joe holds the key to how we can continue to grow and think in new ways about how to package our services and products. Not to mention, I now get to play to my strengths and create innovative content."
Duarte, Inc. will be bringing a number of new offerings to market this year to help address the presentation needs of all leaders and professionals. Whether you are an individual contributor, team leader, executive, or CEO, they have a range of training options to help you communicate your best.
Note to editors: To learn more about Joe Terry and Nancy please see Nancy's post on the Duarte blog.
Duarte, Inc. is a world-class presentation agency and training firm. Since 1988, we have created some of the world's greatest presentations for leaders and brands â€” our clients include almost half of the top 50 brands, notable experts, respected causes, and global consulting firms. Your presentations are the best opportunity to tell your story and inspire people to take action. Duarte, Inc. can help you write, design, and deliver groundbreaking stories and visual presentations for every occasion. Using the Duarte Method, you and your team will learn the skills necessary to deliver persuasive presentations that improve careers, organizations, and lives.

SOURCE Duarte, Inc.
